CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [2][3][4][5] It has also been demonstrated that low band - gap conjugated polymers with broad absorption of the solar spectrum are promising active layer materials to achieve a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Low band-gap conjugated polymers

These are the material name entities in the paragraph. Low band-gap conjugated polymers are a type of material that has the potential to be used as active layer materials in solar cells to achieve a high power conversion efficiency (PCE).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Low band-gap conjugated polymers

This is the only material name entity in the paragraph. I have removed the other irrelevant entities and the phrase "active layer materials" was also removed because it is a property or role of the material rather than the name of the material itself.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Low band-gap conjugated polymers |

The table above lists the valid material name entity found in the paragraph. The entity is presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [2][3][4][5] It has also been demonstrated that low band - gap conjugated polymers with broad absorption of the solar spectrum are promising active layer materials to achieve a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Low band-gap conjugated polymers
2. Broad absorption
3. The solar spectrum
4. A high power conversion efficiency (PCE)

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are called property name entities because they refer to the properties or characteristics of some object or concept. In this case, the properties mentioned are the band-gap of polymers, the absorption of the solar spectrum, and the power conversion efficiency (PCE).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Low band-gap
2. Broad absorption
3. The solar spectrum

These are the material properties in the given paragraph. The other entities, such as "polymers" and "power conversion efficiency (PCE)", are not material properties themselves, but rather the objects or concepts that possess or are associated with these properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Low band-gap |
| Broad absorption |
| The solar spectrum |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [2][3][4][5] It has also been demonstrated that low band - gap conjugated polymers with broad absorption of the solar spectrum are promising active layer materials to achieve a high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ).

Let's think step by step.

1. "low band-gap" is a property of conjugated polymers.
2. "broad absorption" is a property of the solar spectrum.
3. "high power conversion efficiency (PCE)" is a property of the active layer materials made from low band-gap conjugated polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. low band-gap
2. high power conversion efficiency (PCE)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| low band-gap |
| high power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
